main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted to the northwest of Narsarssuak AFB in Greenland on December 18, 1952, by an Air Force Staff Sergeant and a civilian.
interesting points: The object appeared to climb vertically and emitted black smoke at the beginning of its ascent., There were known military aircraft (L-20, C-54, SA-16, SB-17) in the area at the time of the sighting., The object leveled off after climbing vertically before disappearing., The incident was later established as an SB-17 aircraft., The sighting was reported with excellent visibility and calm weather conditions.
witness description: an Air Force Staff Sergeant and a civilian secretary from headquarters
